superseded their collective moral and ethical compass, and Olympic values...
translation.ko: 집단 도덕심과 윤리적 범위를 넘어서, 올림픽의 가치를...

translation.en: [Rodchenkov] I was doing in parallel two things
which canceled out each other in being fully contradictory.

translation.en: Doping and anti-doping.
It was pure, exact doublethink.
I was like a slave.
Slavery was my freedom...
till the end.
So...
truth.
